## Repository class

Abstract class to implement mongodb repository

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare abstract class Repository extends MongoDataSource<Document> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> MongoDataSource&lt;Document

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cursor](./subito-connector-mongodb.repository.cursor.md) | <code>protected</code> | [ICursor](./subito-connector-mongodb.icursor.md) | The cusor definition used by the Paginator |
